scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:files
scripts.lint:css: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const css=fs.readFileSync('css/styles.css','utf8');const open=(css.match(/\{/g)||[]).length;const close=(css.match(/\}/g)||[]).length;if(open!==close)throw new Error('CSS syntax error: unmatched braces');console.log('CSS syntax check passed');"
scripts.lint:js: node -c config/site-config.js && node -c js/utils.js && node -c js/app.js && echo 'JavaScript syntax check passed'
scripts.lint:files: test -f index.html && test -f css/styles.css && test -f js/app.js && test -f js/utils.js && test -f config/site-config.js && echo 'All required files present'
